title: Insights on FDA’s Call for Postmarket Surveillance of Duodenoscopes (AGA - American Gastroenterological Association)
text: ( Source : AGA - American Gastroenterological Association ) Oct. 20, 2015 Michael L. Kochman, MD, who is the chair of the AGA Center for GI Innovation and Technology , provides takeaways from FDA 's October dudodenoscope announcement. By Michael
